storyName: A Bright Flame in the Dark Forest
storyInfo: Dusk falls. The lost party arrives at an abandoned camp after following a mysterious clue, and catch a glimpse into the village's past. After a bit of rest, the two operators get new equipment from the Felyne Artisan.

attributes.content: I saw the rock again.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: How many times is that now?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Let me think... Seven.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: We've been going in circles. We keep coming back here, no matter which way we go.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: If we could just record our movements... Do we have a long enough rope in our equipment?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'll have to remember to apply for one next time... oh yeah!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: What are you up to, Arty?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: M-Meowning for ore.
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Say, don't you have a bunch of good stuff on you? Lemme search your pockets.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: M-Mrrow!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Hey! Hm, this one... aha! Maybe this would work.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: You're right, this black powder could be used to mark the trail. Wait here, I'll try it out.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yato...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I see you.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I see the mark on the ground too.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Another circle...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: We got chased by a pack of rampaging beasts for whatever reason, then we lost the Rathalos's trail, and now we're trapped on some kind of magical hill.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: All our positioning equipment is inoperative, no graphical displays... What the heck's wrong with this forest?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: ...I'll try again. We can't just give up now.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Calm down.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Listen, I think this is a natural phenomenon, rather than an active threat.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Let's just stay put for a minute and observe our surroundings. Maybe there's something we missed. There must be a way out of this.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Plus... Doesn't it feel like we forgot something?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Yato—
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Noir Corne—
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Smithy—
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Where are you?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Come on, enough purr-actical jokes. Come out meow.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: You're hiding behind that tree, aren't you, Noir Corne?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: I know you're behind that rock, Smithy.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Get down from that tree, Yato.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: No... nobody...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Oh no...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: I was just observing some purr-tterns on the trees, then everybody disappeared.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: But it turns out that those purr-terns were just useless scratches on the bark.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar
Felyne Scholar
attributes.content: It's meow own fault...

attributes.name: Felyne Scholar
attributes.content: No! It's an assistant's job to stay purrt when the scholar is doing research!
It's all their fault. They'll never find the Rathalos without meow. They should have res-purr-cted me more.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: That'll show them how important I am. They must be going pawll-out to find me. Especially Noir Corne and Smithy.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Yato... she can be scary, but we have a purr-omise! She won't just leave me like this.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: N-No need to worry! I'll just wait here for them to find meow.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Mrow! Help!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: I-In the forest...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Biologist of the Scriveners, future authority on Terra... are all nine of my lives going to end here?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: No! I-I'll—
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: I... I won't go off on meow own again...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: I won't call Noir Corne stupid anymore... I'll purr-aise Smithy from time to time... I mean, all the time!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Somebody... anybody... help... meow...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: What are you doing, Scholar?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Mrow?
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: I... Meow did you...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: You idiot! Stupid Noir Corne! Hornhead!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Huh? What did I do?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: You're interrupting the ecological research of the meow-vellous scholar furmerly of the Royal Pawleontology Scriveners!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Er... could you repeat that?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: There's a time and a place, people. We've been trapped here for more than two hours.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The sun's about to set. We should be spending our time looking for a way out, not arguing.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: ...Talk, Scholar! What were you researching?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: None of your business!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Let me see... Yato! There are carvings on the bark!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: 'Record of abnormality in the hills...'
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: 'Visual references unreliable. Follow the wind. -Mirai'
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Must be someone who came before us. The message is telling us to follow the wind.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Mrow? It was writing then?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: You found this? Not bad, Scholar! Looks like I underestimated you!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I... Mrow! What do mew mean you underestimated me?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: The wind...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: We can see which way the wind is blowing by sprinkling that dust from up high.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Good idea. Let's try it.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Let me take another look at the carving. Doesn't look like it's been too long... What's this 'Mirai'?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Hey! Wait for me!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: We're finally out of it.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: It's a lake. No wonder the wind was purring.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Hold it. Looks like there's a camp by the shore. There might be someone there.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Stay here while I check it out...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Camp! Campfire! Barbecue! Let's get those paws moving!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Meow!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Finally got the fire lit.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: This camp hasn't been used for ages. Must have been left behind by hunters. Good thing the stuff here still works.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: ...Alright, I guess it's harder to move at night, or spot the Rathalos's tracks.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: We can rest here for a little bit, but after that we need to keep moving.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Alright, alright.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Hehe...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: What are you laughing about?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Nothing... Well, just that you never change. You're always in a rush, like you're being chased by somebody.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: We've been following the Doctor's orders for so long now, yet not a bit of their calmness has rubbed off on you.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: They would want us to achieve our mission as soon as possible.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Fine, fine. You win.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Why don't you listen to me the way you used to, close your eyes, get some rest, and we'll set out again in the morning, fully refreshed?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I'll search the camp for anything useful.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Rest...?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Looks like the headman wasn't lying. There are no hunters left around here, other than old Kashiwau.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: This must have something to do with that big cave that we went into. Maybe with old Kashiwau's temper too...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: We'll know when we find the Rathalos. If you've got the time to worry about all this nonsense, then we might as well set out now.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Fine... Yuck, the box is covered in dust. The lock's all rusted through too. Let me see...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Hey, lots of hunting equipment... machetes, knives, traps, and some solid ropes.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Take everything that looks useful.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: A spear, too. Looks like the same kind that old Kashiwau carries with him.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I've seen ones like that around here. The locals use them for hunting.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: This one's broken, though. No spearhead in the box either. What do you think?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I'm surprised at how elaborate it is.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The core of the handle has been hollowed out. Is that a bowstring in it? It's made from animal hair, pretty solid.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I see... the switch on the handle controls the bowstring, allowing the spear to be thrown with great force, judging by the length of the string.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The broken part is a swivel. Seems like the spear can be turned in a certain direction, or locked, allowing the wielder to deal with different combat situations.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: ...The designer knew what they were doing.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Well, you're the expert when it comes to weapons.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Here, put it back. It's no use to us.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Hey, wait, there are words engraved in the handle.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Akira Kashiwau... is that the owner of the spear?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Old Kashiwau's given name is Yoshitaka. A relative of his? I'll see if there's anything else.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Corne... Huh? What's that on the ground?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: What? Let me see.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: A photo. It must have fallen out of the box when you opened it.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: A gathering of hunters... there's a date on the lower corner. It's from nine years ago.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Is that the headman on the right? Did he use to be a hunter too?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I suppose so.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: He looks completely different in hunter garb. There's a little girl standing to his right.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Hey, look at the guy over here!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Don't shout like that.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: He's the only one in the photo carrying a spear. Looks like the one that's broken, too.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Akira Kashiwau... could it be him? He looks pretty young. Wouldn't quite be middle-aged, even after nine years.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: But I don't remember anyone like him in the village. How about you, Yato?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: So it's a gathering of hunters, but old Kashiwau isn't in it?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Maybe he just wasn't there for the photo. Put it back.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Headman Takii looks so young!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Did he not get along with the others, even back then? But the younger Kashiwau in this photo looks pretty close to him.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: There was a hunter statue in the village, but it hasn't been tended to for a long time. And the headman used to be a hunter... Could this all be because of Akira Kashiwau?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Corne!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: That's enough.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: What does this photo have to do with our mission? Does it matter who's in it or not, or how many people or burdenbeasts there are in the Kashiwau household?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: It means nothing to us.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Our missions take longer than they should because you always get distracted by these things.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Even if we could figure out what happened to the old man's family, what does it change?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Are you going to give him counselling? What about the others? Are you going to win them over with love and understanding?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You saw the people in the village... and that child...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The people here are unknowingly walking towards the abyss. The best we can do is save their lives, no more and no less.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: And the faster we find the Rathalos, the closer we get to the truth, and the better our odds of stopping Oripathy from spreading in the village.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: We must work harder... do everything we can to ensure their safety. That's our mission, our duty.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: And you need to understand that, Corne— No, Operator Noir Corne.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I know, I know. Don't get so angry.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: It's just that I can't help but think about old Kashiwau.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: The things he said, the things he did... that inexplicable stubbornness, his insistence on facing everything on his own... It's as if he's running away from something.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Have you forgotten? It's just like...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: No, never mind.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Anyway, I can't prove it yet, but I wouldn't be so sure that none of this has anything to do with our mission.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Very well, Operator Noir Corne, in that case I'm giving you an order, as captain of Operations Team A4.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You will refrain from concerning yourself with matters unrelated to the mission objective, until such time that there is evidence suggesting otherwise.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: ...Yes, ma'am.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: ...Yato.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I'm... I'm worried about you too.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I'll check the surrounding area for threats. We'll leave once we're rested.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Noir Corne is making me catch fish while he goes and purr-lays with the campfire!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: They're called Fins.
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Based on their appearance and my im-purr-essive knowledge, they're the same exact thing!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: ♪Throw a buoy, let it float, meow♪
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: ♪Knock knock, meow♪
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Remember what I said this afternoon, Smithy?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: I looked through my notes on the ecology of Terra and I realize why something didn't seem right, mrow.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: There are no meownsters in this forest!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Where we came from, there are always meownsters in the wild. What do the scholars say again...?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Yes, balance. They balance the environment, mrow.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: But we haven't seen any creatures like that here. It's so strange.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: And those rampaging hornbeasts. They stripped the bark clean off the trees wherever their paws took them. Do you realize what that means?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Mrow?
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Silly Smithy. It means things were not always like this, otherwise the trees couldn't have grown.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: The ecological order of the forest was destabilized at some point.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Something... went meowssing.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: But not to worry! With you and I here, they can deal with the Rathalos, even if they're not so strong!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Hey, are you listening, Smithy?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: ♪Knock knock, meow♪
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: I shouldn't have had you do this!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: ♪Knock knock, meow♪
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: The fishing buoy isn't moving at all! Are there really any fish in this pond?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Did you catch any Fins, Scholar?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Purrfect timing! Sit here.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Take this.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: The fishing rod? Why?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Don't meowve.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Stay!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: ...What are you doing?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Watching you fish.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Why, you—oh!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: The buoy sank!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: It's so heavy! What do I do?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Pull! Pull hard!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: They're dead... because of you...
Stop running... Yato...
Because of you...
Argh! W-Why...? It happened so long ago...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Noir Corne!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Four turns! No more than that!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Look, I was watching this whole time, and it hasn't changed color at all... whoa!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Okay, now it has!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: And now it's burnt...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Your own fault for not listening! You eat it!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: My fault? It's all because you distracted me...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Mroaaaw!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Hey! Stop scratching my horn!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Mrrow...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Shouldn't you be saving your strength for the Rathalos? Don't let me catch you running away as soon as we get a glimpse.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I told you, I know purrcisely how to deal with the Rathalos. I've noted its weaknesses in my notebook.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: It's just that your weapons are too weak. Good thing I had the purresence of mind to tell Smithy to meowke stronger weapons.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Rathalos... I wonder what its meat tastes like...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I tell you, Rathalos liver is pawsitively delicious! Nothing is tastier!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: *Huff*...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: —! Who goes there?!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yato? Where are you going?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I saw a shadow in the corner of my eye. It went this way.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Who's there? Come out!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I know you're there.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (Where did they go?)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Meow...
(Over there!)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'll give you one chance to show yourself.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (Approaches slowly)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Show yourself right now!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Meow! It's Yato!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Artisan? It was you?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Mrow?
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: No, it couldn't be... the one I saw was...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Are they gone?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yato—
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Y-You're too fast...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Did you see something?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Yes, but I lost them.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: What are you doing here, Arty?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Knocking on meowterials.
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: You're making... armor and weapons? For the fight against the Rathalos?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Don't touch it!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: No stone! Use this instead!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Is that really something that can be swapped just like that?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Click! There.
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Equipment for two!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: You want us to put them on?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Purrt them on! Better against Rathalos!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: It's worth a shot.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Well, I for one can't wait!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: ...You change over there, Corne.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: How do I... put this on?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Does my arm go through here?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: And why is it so...?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I've never... worn anything like this before.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Am I wearing this right? I can't tell.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The helmet's so heavy... and stuffy... is this right?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Ouch! And why are there spikes here? They're even longer than my horn.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Is this really meant for wearing?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: (The material is light, but surprisingly tough.)
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: (Arty said they made it using Rathalos parts they brought with them. Not even Yato could cut through it...)
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: (But something feels familiar about this material.)
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: (Where have I seen it before? I just can't remember.)
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Yato? I'm done over here. Where are you?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I'm coming! Whoa—
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Ow, I hit my head... And now I can't see anything.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Did it go like this? Finally got it on right.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: (Looks at Yato)
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Light, swift, powerful.
That's what I always tell people when I talk about this strange new gear afterwards.
'That's not what we were asking about!'
And that's the answer I always get from other operators.
I still don't understand what they mean.
Its showing so much skin... Is this really supposed to be protective gear?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: But... I do feel a strange tingling on my skin. And my discomfort from the light is gone.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Look at that, Kirin set!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Kirin set? Is that what this is called?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Mrow.
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: ...I suppose I should ask Leizi about it.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Terra meowterial's not bad! Good substitute.
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: (Whisper) ...Thanks, Originium slugs.
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: My new blades need to be tested in battle... Corne?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: What are you doing on the ground?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I... I tripped. Not used to this new gear.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Wait, your mask...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I took it off. Doesn't seem like I'll need it to block out the light with this gear, and it's extra weight I don't need.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: What... What are you staring at?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Nothing!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: ...Get up. We can't afford to be caught off guard out here. Get used to it quickly.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: O-Okay!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Yato! Noir Corne!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: That strange old man came!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: He took your gear!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar
